languages.text: "Я... должна побыть наедине с собой. Понять, кто я... рядом с тобой. Быть может, мне стоит на время примерять иную маску и посмотреть, насколько она мне подойдет". {n}Кибелла затихает. Медленно, словно проталкиваясь через толщу воды, она отступает от вас и отворачивается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я... должна побыть наедине с собой. Понять, кто я... рядом с тобой. Быть может, если маска Кровавой паутины уже не ложится на мое лицо... время примерить иную". {n}Кибелла затихает. Медленно, словно проталкиваясь через толщу воды, она отступает от вас и отворачивается.{/n}

languages.text: "I... I need to be alone — to understand who I am... with you. Perhaps I should try on a different mask for a time and see how well it fits me." {n}Kibellah falls silent. Slowly, as if pushing through water, she withdraws from you and turns away.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я... должна побыть наедине с собой. Понять, кто я... рядом с тобой. Быть может, мне стоит на время примерять иную маску и посмотреть, насколько она мне подойдет". {n}Кибелла затихает. Медленно, словно проталкиваясь через толщу воды, она отступает от вас и отворачивается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I... I need to be alone. To understand who I am... with you. Perhaps, if a weaver's mask no longer fits me... it's time I tried on a different one." {n}Kibellah goes quiet. Slowly, as if pushing through water, she withdraws from you and turns away.{/n}

"I... I need to be alone. To understand who I am... with you. Perhaps, if a weaver's mask no longer fits me... it's time I tried on a different one." {n}Kibellah goes quiet. Slowly, as if pushing through water, she withdraws from you and turns away.{/n}

"I... I need to be alone — to understand who I am... with you. Perhaps, if the weaver's mask no longer fits me... it's time to try a different one." {n}Kibellah falls silent. Slowly, as if pushing through water, she withdraws from you and turns away.{/n}

"I... I need to be alone — to understand who I am... with you. Perhaps, if the weaver's mask no longer fits me... it's time to try a different one." {n}Kibellah falls silent. Slowly, as if pushing through water, she withdraws from you and turns away.{/n}

"I... I need to be alone — to understand who I am... with you. Perhaps I should try on a different mask for a time and see how well it fits me." {n}Kibellah falls silent. Slowly, as if pushing through water, she withdraws from you and turns away.{/n}

"I... I need to be alone — to understand who I am... with you. Perhaps I should try on a different mask for a time and see how well it fits me." {n}Kibellah falls silent. Slowly, as if pushing through water, she withdraws from you and turns away.{/n}

"I... I need to be alone — to understand who I am... with you. Perhaps I should try on a different mask for a time and see how well it fits me." {n}Kibellah falls silent. Slowly, as if pushing through water, she withdraws from you and turns away.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich ... Ich muss allein sein. Um zu verstehen, wer ich bin ... mit Euch. Vielleicht sollte ich für eine Weile eine andere Maske tragen und sehen, wie gut sie mir passt." {n}Kibellah verstummt. Langsam, als würde sie durch Wasser waten, weicht sie von dir zurück und wendet sich ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... I need to be alone — to understand who I am... with you. Perhaps I should try on a different mask for a time and see how well it fits me." {n}Kibellah falls silent. Slowly, as if pushing through water, she withdraws from you and turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... Ich muss allein sein. Um zu verstehen, wer ich bin ... mit Euch. Vielleicht sollte ich für eine Weile eine andere Maske tragen und sehen, wie gut sie mir passt." {n}Kibellah verstummt. Langsam, als würde sie durch Wasser waten, weicht sie von dir zurück und wendet sich ab.{/n}

"Ich ... Ich muss allein sein. Um zu verstehen, wer ich bin ... mit Euch. Wenn mir die Maske der Weberin nicht mehr passt, ist es vielleicht ... Zeit, eine andere zu probieren." {n}Kibellah verstummt. Langsam, als würde sie durch Wasser waten, weicht sie von dir zurück und wendet sich ab.{/n}

languages.text: «Necesito... Necesito estar sola, para entender quién soy... con usted. Tal vez debería probarme otra máscara para ver qué tal me queda». {n}Kibellah guarda silencio. Lentamente, como si vadeara a contracorriente, se aleja de ti y te da la espalda.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... I need to be alone — to understand who I am... with you. Perhaps I should try on a different mask for a time and see how well it fits me." {n}Kibellah falls silent. Slowly, as if pushing through water, she withdraws from you and turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Necesito... Necesito estar sola, para entender quién soy... con usted. Tal vez debería probarme otra máscara para ver qué tal me queda». {n}Kibellah guarda silencio. Lentamente, como si vadeara a contracorriente, se aleja de ti y te da la espalda.{/n}

«Necesito... Necesito estar sola, para entender quién soy... contigo. Tal vez, si la máscara de tejedora ya no es apropiada para mí... sea el momento de probarme otra». {n}Kibellah guarda silencio. Lentamente, como si vadeara a contracorriente, se aleja de ti y te da la espalda.{/n}

languages.text: 「我は…一人にならなくては。理解したいのです、自分のことを…陛下とともにいる時の。おそらく、しばらくの間、別の仮面をして、それが合うのかどうかを試してみるべきかもしれません」{n}キベラが沈黙する。ゆっくりと、まるで水の中を進むかのように、彼女はあなたから離れて背を向けた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... I need to be alone — to understand who I am... with you. Perhaps I should try on a different mask for a time and see how well it fits me." {n}Kibellah falls silent. Slowly, as if pushing through water, she withdraws from you and turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我は…一人にならなくては。理解したいのです、自分のことを…陛下とともにいる時の。おそらく、しばらくの間、別の仮面をして、それが合うのかどうかを試してみるべきかもしれません」{n}キベラが沈黙する。ゆっくりと、まるで水の中を進むかのように、彼女はあなたから離れて背を向けた。{/n}
「私…一人にならなくては。理解したいの、自分を…あなたといる時の。おそらく、織り手の仮面が合わなくなったのなら…別の仮面を試す時なのかもしれない」{n}キベラが沈黙する。ゆっくりと、まるで水の中を進むかのように、彼女はあなたから離れて背を向けた。{/n}

languages.text: “我……我需要一个人静静，弄清楚……我和你在一起的时候……我究竟是谁。或许我应该换个面具试试，看看它适不适合我。”{n}绮贝菈不再开口，转过了身，慢慢从你身边走开，仿佛在涉水而行。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... I need to be alone — to understand who I am... with you. Perhaps I should try on a different mask for a time and see how well it fits me." {n}Kibellah falls silent. Slowly, as if pushing through water, she withdraws from you and turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我……我需要一个人静静，弄清楚……我和你在一起的时候……我究竟是谁。或许我应该换个面具试试，看看它适不适合我。”{n}绮贝菈不再开口，转过了身，慢慢从你身边走开，仿佛在涉水而行。{/n}
“我……我需要一个人静静，弄清楚……我和你在一起的时候……我究竟是谁。如果织网者的面具不再适合我，或许……是时候换个面具试试了。”{n}绮贝菈不再开口，转过了身，慢慢从你身边走开，仿佛在涉水而行。{/n}

languages.text: « Je... j'ai besoin d'être seule. Pour comprendre qui je suis... quand je suis avec vous. Peut-être devrais-je endosser temporairement un masque différent, pour voir s'il me convient. » {n}Kibellah sombre dans le silence. Lentement, et visiblement à contrecœur, elle s'écarte de vous avant de quitter la pièce.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... I need to be alone — to understand who I am... with you. Perhaps I should try on a different mask for a time and see how well it fits me." {n}Kibellah falls silent. Slowly, as if pushing through water, she withdraws from you and turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je... j'ai besoin d'être seule. Pour comprendre qui je suis... quand je suis avec vous. Peut-être devrais-je endosser temporairement un masque différent, pour voir s'il me convient. » {n}Kibellah sombre dans le silence. Lentement, et visiblement à contrecœur, elle s'écarte de vous avant de quitter la pièce.{/n}

« Je... j'ai besoin d'être seule. Pour comprendre qui je suis... quand je suis avec vous. Si le masque de tisseuse ne me convient plus... peut-être est-il temps d'en essayer un autre. » {n}Kibellah sombre dans le silence. Lentement, et visiblement à contrecœur, elle s'écarte de vous avant de quitter la pièce.{/n}
